biotools.summary:
Predicting HLA class II antigen presentation through integrated deep learning.

MARIA is a machine learning tool developed by Chen et al. to predict likelihood of HLA-II peptide ligand presentation given cell HLA alleles, peptide sequences, and source genes of the peptides.

bioschemas.name: MARIA
